ygData.subject: Re: Pod In Trouble
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She clutches to her seat with a death grip and the pod turns. She whispers, I m fine, the pod is ok and we are going to make it.  She spoke to Striker.

::Spears::

She clutches to her seat with a death grip and the pod turns. She 
whispers, "I'm fine, the pod is ok and we are going to make it."  She 
spoke to Striker. "Well, you have to try to find the time to relax. 
Even the bravest warrior must relax sometime."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker sighs. "There's never time to daydream in wars. And I've 
been in wars 
> all my life."
> 
> He looks sadly out the window, looking at the ocean below. The pod 
tilts 
> slightly as it turns, correcting its course. "Over the last several 
months, 
> there were battles every couple of seconds, so leasure wasn't an 
option."
